notesStmt.note: Wor has this as an addition, possibly substituting for Rorate caeli

rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Alb2 Evm Mch Cdm Ely Wor Wcb Bat

res.rBody: Modo veniet dominator dominus et nomen eius Emmanuel vocabitur

verses.vBody: Ecce dominator dominus cum virtute veniet

Et dominabitur a mari usque ad mare et a flumine usque ad terminos orbis
terrarum terrae
Et requiescet super eum spiritus domini spiritus sapientiae et intellectus

vBody.wit: CAO-S Hyd Alb2 Evm Cdm Ely Wor Wcb Bat

verses.vBody: Orietur in diebus eius iustitia et abundantia pacis

rep.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Alb2 Evm Mch Cdm Ely Wor Wcb Bat
